Name: Amulet of Thrayax
Description:
Amulet of Thrayax is a competitive, card-driven area control board game for 2 - 6 players, designed by Tom Truman and published by Trolls ’n’ Rerolls.

You are eccentric cults, rampaging through the dystopian fantasy city of Bleakpyre, harvesting the souls of decadent nobles and selfish peasants with every outrageous tool at your disposal.

Battling to win the powerful Amulet of Thrayax, you use a combination of Murder and Counter cards to reap souls - AKA points - from the city.

To claim the amulet, you'll need to bring all your most devious tactics to the party:


     Spend souls to swoop from District to District
     Tip the scales with a variety of corrupt, monstrous and messy "Inconveniences"
     Hijack your opponent's best-laid plans to feed your own soul engine
     Manipulate the Amulet’s power to unleash the biggest and baddest combos on your unsuspecting rivals


When the final bell chimes, the winner is the cult that has beaten and hoodwinked the most souls out of Bleakpyre.

If you’re looking for a fun, accessible game that also provides a layer of tactical challenge for seasoned gamers, then we think you’ll love killing time with Amulet of Thrayax.

—description from the publisher

Name: Erune: Miniature Set – Set de figurines
Description:
This set adds new monsters not in the core box.  It contains 
2 Rats
2 Skeletons
2 Skeleton Archers
2 Living Armors
2 Goblins
2 Goblin Archers
2 Goblin Riders
2 Orcs
1 Troll
2 Gargoyles
2 Evil Dogs
1 Fiens
1 Witch

Name: Kantin Wars
Description:
A card game for people who love playing with their food, or throwing them at other people.

From the co-creator of The Cikgu Life, comes a game inspired about a real food fight that broke out in a school canteen. Kantin Wars will remind you of the food you enjoyed back in school, while also allowing you to sabo the people around you.

Players draw food cards which they can throw at each other, until the Discipline Teacher shows up and punishes them all! Play different cards that help you throw better, dodge flying food, hide away or even wash up to ensure you stay clean during the fight!

Name: Depths of Courage: Attack on Alexandria, December 19, 1941
Description:
Depths of Courage volume 9 is a solitaire game on the Italian mini-sub attack on Alexandria Harbor. The active player takes on the role of the commanders of the three, two-man crew S.L.C. (Siluro Lenta Corsa) Maiale (Pig) class mini-submarines. You must endeavor to overcome the Allied defenses and night-time visibility to inflict as much damage as possible before being killed, captured or escaping.

Each copy of Depths of Courage volume 9 is composed of the following:

One 11 by 17 point-to-point map
20 double sided, un-mounted counters
6 pages of rules with designer notes and bibliography

Players will also need a standard deck of playing cards (a custom card set for the entire series of games is available) and six sided die to play the game.
Families: Series: Depths of Courage (High Flying Dice)

Name: Totenstadt: Meister der Illusion Booster
Description:
This booster expands Totenstadt by 21 new cards!

The cult of blood rages in the Totenstadt. As if zombies and mutants weren't enough, you now also have to deal with blood horrors, suicides and insane blood rituals!

The cards can simply be mixed up with the Totenstadt basic box and the missions can be expanded with new possibilities and encounters.
 -------------------------------------------------------------------
Dieser Booster erweitert Totenstadt um 21 neue Karten!

Der Kult des Blutes wüttet in der Totenstadt.
Als würden Zombies und Mutanten nicht schon genug sein bekommt ihr es jetzt auch nocht mit Blutschrecken, Selbstmördern und irren Blutritualen zu tun!

Die Karten können einfach mit der Totenstadt Basisbox vermischt werden und die Missionen mit neuen Möglichkeiten und Begegnungen erweitern!

Name: Totenstadt: Infizierter Glaube Booster
Description:
This booster expands Totenstadt by 21 new cards!

Father Harry calls for church service in the Totenstadt. Disciples and acolytes prepare for baptism, and a priest needs your help to save his flock from Father Harry and his evil minions.

The cards can simply be mixed up with the Totenstadt basic box and the missions can be expanded with new possibilities and encounters


Dieser Booster erweitert Totenstadt um 21 neue Karten!Pater Harry ruft zum Gottesdienst in der Totenstadt.
Jünger und Messdiener bereiten sich auf die Taufe vor und ein Pater braucht eure Hilfe um seine Schäfchen zu retten.

Die Karten können einfach mit der Totenstadt Basisbox vermischt werden und die Missionen mit neuen Möglichkeiten und Begegnungen erweitern!
